snippet: The relationship between Paul Nunziato and David Wildstein is under scrutiny as investigators piece together events that led to the lane closings near the George Washington Bridge.
abstract: Close relationship between Paul Nunziato, head of Port Authority police union and David Wildstein, ex-authority official, has come under scrutiny as investigators piece together events that led up to lane closings on George Washington Bridge in Sept 2013; federal prosecutors have questioned Nunziato as part of inquiry but have said nothing publicly.
lead_paragraph: The relationship between Paul Nunziato and David Wildstein is under scrutiny as investigators piece together events that led to the lane closings near the George Washington Bridge.

headline.main: Head of Port Authority Police Union Questioned in Bridge Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Head of Port Authority Police Union Questioned in Bridge Inquiry

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
